title: Naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c']bis([1,2,3]thiadiazole) Enables an Efficient Halogen-Free Polymer Donor and Realizes Organic Solar Cells with Efficiency over 19%
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02414A, Paper
Tao Jia, Yongmin Luo, Yulong Hai, Tao Lin, Xudong Qin, Ruijie Ma, Kezou Fan, Aleksandr A. Sergeev, Top Archie Padilla Dela Pe√±a, Yao Li, Mingjie Li, Kam Sing Wong, Gang Li, Jiaying Wu, Shengjian Liu, Fei Huang
Polymer donors with aromatic fused rings are considered as significance in reaching efficient non-fullerene organic solar cells (OSCs). In this contribution, a novel fused electron-withdrawing motif naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c']bis([1,2,3]thiadiazole) (iNT) is developed...
